snippet: Gov. Earl Ray Tomblin said he was concerned about the constitutionality of a bill banning abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, which the State Legislature passed over the weekend.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Earl Ray Tomblin said he was concerned about the constitutionality of a bill banning abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, which the State Legislature passed over the weekend.

headline.main: West Virginia: Governor Weighs Abortion Bill
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Governor Weighs Abortion Bill
